official_title: A joint resolution to designate a period between Abraham Lincoln's birthday and George Washington's birthday of each year as "National Patriotism Week".

summary.text: Designates the period between Lincoln's Birthday and Washington's Birthday as "National Patriotism Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to designate a period between Abraham Lincoln's birthday and George Washington's birthday of each year as "National Patriotism Week".
